item.description:
Come celebrate my Jan' 11 Graduation ! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge. Network with interesting musicians and nice people. If you sing and/or play you can play solo or with the back up band behind you, or just listen & party with other musicians… All instruments and styles welcome – originals, covers, blues, jazz, Funk, Fusion, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, Country. Extensive song list to choose from for singers, or bring your song music/chord sheets.


Nice Stage Hall GREAT FOR DANCING and MINGLING, and inexpensive drinks. Low pressure easygoing atmosphere, perfection not needed - all levels welcome - we will try to fit you in. Any questions , please email.

STREET PARKING is available. No pay street parking meter after 8PM. Located next door to the UNION SQUARE FAMILY CLINIC

website to get words & chords: www.chordie.com
item.name: Graduation Party @ P.A.s Lounge in UNION SQUARE
